languages.text: Проанализировав данные авгуров, офицеры с удивлением поняли, что эта планета некогда была покрыта океаном. Таинственная древняя катастрофа превратила ее в безжизненную пустыню без единого озерца воды. Самым удивительным оказались кости колоссальных существ, водившихся в исчезнувшем океане. Некоторые скелеты настолько велики, что их можно различить с орбиты.

traits.locale_text: Проанализировав данные авгуров, офицеры с удивлением поняли, что эта планета некогда была покрыта океаном. Таинственная древняя катастрофа превратила ее в безжизненную пустыню без единого озерца воды. Самым удивительным оказались кости колоссальных существ, водившихся в исчезнувшем океане. Некоторые скелеты настолько велики, что их можно различить с орбиты.

languages.text: After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.
languages.original_text: Проанализировав данные авгуров, офицеры с удивлением поняли, что эта планета некогда была покрыта океаном. Таинственная древняя катастрофа превратила ее в безжизненную пустыню без единого озерца воды. Самым удивительным оказались кости колоссальных существ, водившихся в исчезнувшем океане. Некоторые скелеты настолько велики, что их можно различить с орбиты.

traits.locale_text: After analyzing the data, the officers were surprised to find out that the planet was once covered with oceans. An unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out, and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing thing about the world are the skeletal remains of colossal water beasts. Some are so large they can be seen from orbit.

After analyzing the data, the officers were surprised to find out that the planet was once covered with oceans. An unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out, and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing thing about the world are the skeletal remains of colossal water beasts. Some are so large they can be seen from orbit.

After analysing the augurs' data, the officers were surprised to find out that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out, and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery are the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms. Some are so large they can be seen from orbit.

After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

languages.text: 在分析俄歇扫描的数据之后，军官们惊讶地发现，这颗行星曾被海洋覆盖。很久之前，行星上发生了原因不明的灾害，所有海洋都干涸了，整个世界也变成了一片没有生命的沙漠。最令人惊奇的是，船员们发现了巨型海洋生物的遗骨。部分遗骨极其庞大，甚至可以直接在轨道上用肉眼看到。
languages.original_text: After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

traits.locale_text: 在分析俄歇扫描的数据之后，军官们惊讶地发现，这颗行星曾被海洋覆盖。很久之前，行星上发生了原因不明的灾害，所有海洋都干涸了，整个世界也变成了一片没有生命的沙漠。最令人惊奇的是，船员们发现了巨型海洋生物的遗骨。部分遗骨极其庞大，甚至可以直接在轨道上用肉眼看到。

languages.text: Tras analizar el dato de los augures, los oficiales descubrieron con sorpresa que el mundo estuvo antaño cubierto de océanos. Hace mucho, un cataclismo desconocido secó los mares y convirtió el planeta en un desierto sin vida. El mayor descubrimiento de todos fue el esqueleto de varios organismos oceánicos colosales, algunos tan inmensos que pueden distinguirse desde la órbita.
languages.original_text: After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

traits.locale_text: Tras analizar el dato de los augures, los oficiales descubrieron con sorpresa que el mundo estuvo antaño cubierto de océanos. Hace mucho, un cataclismo desconocido secó los mares y convirtió el planeta en un desierto sin vida. El mayor descubrimiento de todos fue el esqueleto de varios organismos oceánicos colosales, algunos tan inmensos que pueden distinguirse desde la órbita.

languages.text: スキャナーのデータを分析すると、驚いたことに、この惑星がかつて海で覆われていたことを発見した。太古に起こった未知の天変地異により海が干上がり、生命が存在しない砂漠と化していたのだ。また、最も驚愕したのは巨大な海洋生物の骨格の存在で、惑星の軌道上から見ることができるほどの大きさのものもあった。
languages.original_text: After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーのデータを分析すると、驚いたことに、この惑星がかつて海で覆われていたことを発見した。太古に起こった未知の天変地異により海が干上がり、生命が存在しない砂漠と化していたのだ。また、最も驚愕したのは巨大な海洋生物の骨格の存在で、惑星の軌道上から見ることができるほどの大きさのものもあった。

languages.text: Bei der Analyse der Augurendaten stellten die Offiziere überrascht fest, dass der Planet früher einmal mit Ozeanen bedeckt gewesen war. Vor langer Zeit führte eine unbekannte Katastrophe dazu, dass die Meere austrockneten, und die Welt verwandelte sich in eine leblose Wüste. Die erstaunlichste Entdeckung waren die Skelette kolossaler ozeanischer Organismen, teilweise so groß, dass sie aus dem Orbit zu erkennen waren.
languages.original_text: After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

traits.locale_text: Bei der Analyse der Augurendaten stellten die Offiziere überrascht fest, dass der Planet früher einmal mit Ozeanen bedeckt gewesen war. Vor langer Zeit führte eine unbekannte Katastrophe dazu, dass die Meere austrockneten, und die Welt verwandelte sich in eine leblose Wüste. Die erstaunlichste Entdeckung waren die Skelette kolossaler ozeanischer Organismen, teilweise so groß, dass sie aus dem Orbit zu erkennen waren.

languages.text: Après analyse des données des augures, les officiers ont été surpris de découvrir que la planète était autrefois recouverte d'océans. Il y a très longtemps, un cataclysme inconnu a provoqué l'assèchement des océans, transformant ainsi ce monde en un désert dénué de vie. La découverte la plus incroyable fut celle de restes squelettiques provenant de gigantesques organismes marins, assez grands pour être observés depuis l'orbite.
languages.original_text: After analysing the augur data, the officers were surprised to discover that the planet was once covered with oceans. Long ago, an unknown cataclysm caused the seas to dry out and turned the world into a lifeless desert. The most amazing discovery of all was the skeletal remains of colossal oceanic organisms, some large enough to be seen from orbit.

traits.locale_text: Après analyse des données des augures, les officiers ont été surpris de découvrir que la planète était autrefois recouverte d'océans. Il y a très longtemps, un cataclysme inconnu a provoqué l'assèchement des océans, transformant ainsi ce monde en un désert dénué de vie. La découverte la plus incroyable fut celle de restes squelettiques provenant de gigantesques organismes marins, assez grands pour être observés depuis l'orbite.
